title: Hong Kong bans flights from U.S. and 7 other countries as omicron surges
content:
1. Hong Kong bans flights from U.S. and 7 other countries as omicron surges  NPR
  2. Hong Kong Bans Flights, Shuts Nightlife After Omicron Bursts Pandemic-Free Bubble  The Wall Street Journal
  3. Hong Kong reimposes tough Covid-19 restrictions in bid to ward off fifth pandemic wave  South China Morning Post
  4. Hong Kong suspends flights from eight countries  Air Cargo News
  5. Hong Kong bans all flights from U.S. and seven other countries as omicron spreads  The Washington Post
